programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: When an illegal arms broker-turned-informant is assassinated, OA assumes his identity and goes under cover to stop the sale of dangerous weapons, with help from Maggie and their former FBI instructor.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: When a judge and her daughter are murdered after she sentences a man to life in prison, Maggie and OA search for the killer; Dana has a history with the victim and a vested interest in the case.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: When an alt-right provocateur is murdered after giving a speech at a university in New York City, Maggie and OA investigate the school's more extreme political groups and rely on OA's sister, a student, for help.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: Maggie and OA must find a couple that is responsible for a spree of violent armed robberies that led to the death of an off-duty police officer.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: After an investigative journalist is murdered, the team uncovers information linking the suspect to past cases; the victim's death strikes a chord with Maggie, leaving her desperate for answers in regard to a traumatic event in her personal life.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: A serial bomber appears to be targeting Wall Street's elite; Maggie and OA search for a suspect who seems set on revenge; Dana deals with Spencer Briggs, a cocky profiler brought in to consult on the case.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: The daughter of a wealthy family is kidnapped in an attempt to gain notorious internet fame; Maggie and OA discover the kidnapper's plans go far beyond abduction.

programme.title: Mike Hammer, Private Eye
programme.desc: A janitor named Andy is embroiled in a murderous plot that leaves a stockbroker dead; when Andy finds the body and incriminates himself, Hammer is the only person that can clear his name.

programme.title: Mike Hammer, Private Eye
programme.desc: Hammers' efforts to prove that a crooked cop has sold out to the mob leave him in a perilous situation.

programme.title: Mike Hammer, Private Eye
programme.desc: When a popular mystery author is murdered after he writes a new novel, Hammer must solve the crime; plot twists lead to more questions.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Nell sends Sam to meet an informant who plans to blow the whistle on a military secret; Kensi and Deeks debate whether or not to buy their first house.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The body of a murdered Navy reservist is found by thieves in the midst of a robbery, and NCIS must work with the burglars to find the killer; Kensi and Deeks struggle to decide if they are ready to make the leap and buy a house.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: In order to get intel on a matter of national security, Kensi must come face-to-face with a sociopath who has been obsessed with her since she put him in jail years ago; Eric is desperate to keep Kensi safe, but he is forced to leave NCIS.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Before Christmas, Hetty assigns Callen the case of his former foster brother and his wife, who, upon reentry into the U.S., are framed for smuggling drugs across the border; Deeks is struggling with losing his job at NCIS.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The NCIS team's murder investigation of a man who sold military information leads to the abduction of a doctor whose cutting-edge neurotechnology could be developed into advanced weaponry; Callen tries to have an important talk with Arkady.

programme.desc: Severide becomes frustrated with the police; a girl is trapped in a donation bin; a fire breaks out in a 20-story building downtown.

programme.desc: Detective Lindsay calls in suspects in the disappearance of Katie's kidnapper; Jones struggles to fit in; Herrmann celebrates his 20th wedding anniversary.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide feels compelled to help a man he saved from a car accident; Casey and Boden struggle to deal with the orders from Jones' father; a call to duty affects the firehouse.

programme.desc: Surprised Dawson receives a suicide note; Severide looks into Bloom's dark past; Shay and Casey search for a life-changing item.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A large explosion sends Chicago into chaos; the members of the firehouse are tested when one of their own goes missing in the blast.

programme.desc: A call to the field may throw a wrench in Dawson's plan to retake the firefighter exam; the firehouse welcomes a new addition; Boden makes a bold move.

programme.desc: A fire at a boarding school shakes up Lt. Severide; Lt. Casey tries to help Dawson; Mills looks into his father's past.
